services.name: UI Development
services.description: Design and develop interactive interfaces using React.js, TailwindCSS, and HTML/CSS/JS to ensure a smooth and engaging user experience.

services.name: Performance Optimization
services.description: Improve site performance with Lazy Loading, Code Splitting, and using React.memo and the Redux Toolkit to reduce resource consumption.

services.name: Responsive Design
services.description: Develop websites that work efficiently on all devices (computer, mobile, tablet) using CSS Flexbox, Grid, and Media Queries.

services.name: State Management
services.description: Use Redux Toolkit and React Query to manage data efficiently and reduce unnecessary API calls.

services.name: Authentication & Authorization
services.description: Implement login using Clerk, Firebase Auth, or JWT to secure data and protect users.

services.name: Figma to Code
services.description: Convert Figma, Adobe XD designs to clean code using React.js and Tailwind CSS with UI/UX details in mind.
